    • contains

      public static boolean contains(int value, int[] array)
      returns a boolean value on whether integer value was found in an array
      Parameters:
      value - integer that is looked for in array
      array - target int array
      Returns:
      boolean value, true means int was found

    • uniqueCheck

      public static boolean uniqueCheck(int[] array)
      Checks to see if the provided int array contains duplicates. If duplicates are found, it sends a boolean true statement in return
      Parameters:
      array - int array to be checked for duplicates
      Returns:
      boolean value, true means a duplicate was found

    • minMaxCheck

      public static boolean minMaxCheck(int min, int max, int[] array)
      Ensures each int value in the array falls within the minimum and maximum values provided If a value falls outside, the program returns a boolean true value
      Parameters:
      min - minimum value
      max - maximum value
      array - array that is checked
      Returns:
      boolean value, true = number fell outside the min max range

    • containsSameValues

      public static int containsSameValues(int[] array1, int[] array2)
      Compares the integers in two arrays to each other and returns the number of matches
      Parameters:
      array1 - first int array
      array2 - second int array
      Returns:
      numOfMatches number of integers shared by two arrays
